title: Claude Opus 4.6 with Agent Teams
description: Introduced Agent Teams feature alongside Claude Opus 4.6 on February 5, 2026, enabling multiple Claude Code agents to collaborate on tasks. Agent Teams allow parallel work coordination, file ownership management, direct agent communication, and automated task distribution. Opus 4.6 also features 1M token context window and adaptive thinking.

community_feedback.quote: We tasked Opus 4.6 using agent teams to build a C Compiler - Anthropic used 16 Claude AI agents working together in $20,000 experiment
Claude Opus 4.6 discussion reached front page of HN with 395+ upvotes
Agent Teams is a paradigm shift in AI-assisted development, moving from single-agent workflows to multi-agent collaborative teams
Opus 4.6 with Agent Teams found 500+ high-severity flaws across major codebases in security testing

title: Long-Running Agents in Research Preview
description: Released Long-Running Agents feature on February 12, 2026, enabling Cursor to work autonomously over longer horizons to complete larger, more complex tasks. The feature plans first before executing and is available for Ultra, Teams, and Enterprise plans at cursor.com/agents. Internal testing showed agents completed work previously too difficult with larger, more complete PRs.

community_feedback.quote: Since today on Feb 12 2026, Cursor is not giving good results... Composer 1.5 performed worse and failed to fix issues multiple times
Scaling long-running autonomous coding - discussion about planner/worker algorithmic solutions and missing QoS + diagnostics
Anyone succeed building something cool with long-running agents? Users sharing 24/7 research center experiences
Share your experience with Long-running Agents - official forum discussion

title: GPT-5.3-Codex Generally Available
description: GPT-5.3-Codex became generally available for GitHub Copilot on February 9, 2026. OpenAI's latest agentic coding model features enhanced capabilities for working in large codebases over long sessions. Also introduced Agent Skills support in preview for JetBrains IDEs on February 13, and added fast mode for Claude Opus 4.6 in preview on February 7.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.3-Codex is an interactive collaborator where you can steer it mid-execution, stay in the loop, and course-correct as it works
GPT-5.3-Codex review after 4 days of use on UI code and refactoring large TypeScript backend API
GPT-5.3-Codex being routed to GPT-5.2 - discussion about cybersecurity concerns and account flagging
GPT-5.3-Codex rolling out to Copilot Today!

title: Arena Mode and Claude Opus 4.6
description: Released Wave 14 featuring Arena Mode on January 30, 2026, enabling side-by-side model comparison directly in the IDE with hidden model identities. Added Plan Mode for smarter task planning. Claude Opus 4.6 and Opus 4.6 (fast mode) became available with limited-time promotional pricing. GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark added to Arena Mode on February 4.

community_feedback.quote: The @windsurf Arena Mode leaderboard is live. How does it stack up?
It's Windsurf Wave 14 - Arena Mode pits models against each other while retaining context and workflow
Opus 4.6 is free in Arena Mode! Extended the free period for battle groups
Arena Mode's model comparison capabilities described as groundbreaking

title: Cascade Improvements and Linux ARM64 Support
description: Released version 1.9552.21 on February 12, 2026, with Plan Mode now supporting automatic switching back to Code Mode when implementing. Added support for reading skills from .agents/skills directory, full Linux ARM64 client support with deb and rpm packaging, and cloud configuration for Cascade Hooks for enterprise teams.

title: Scheduled Devins and Devin Review Enhancements
description: Released scheduled recurring Devin sessions on February 3, 2026, with configurable frequency, prompt, and playbook. Added Devin Review features including draft PR support, file comments and @mentions, and auto-review settings popover. Reorganized settings sidebar and added per-product consumption analytics API.

community_feedback.quote: Cognition expanded to Europe with a London office
Agent Trace support added (joining Cursor, Cloudflare, and Vercel)

title: Schedule from Input Box and Enterprise Features
description: Released February 6, 2026 update allowing quick creation of scheduled Devin sessions directly from the input box. Redesigned enterprise landing page with cleaner organization list. Added Devin Review auto-review settings popover, hide comment highlights option, and removed git permissions for indexing repos in primary organization for enterprises.

title: v0.28.0 - Extensions and Authentication Enhancements
description: Released v0.28.0 on February 3, 2026, adding /prompt-suggest slash command for prompt suggestions, Positron IDE support, custom themes in extensions with automatic theme switching based on terminal background, and interactive/non-interactive OAuth consent with auth method inclusion in bug reports.

title: v0.27.0 - Event-Driven Architecture and /rewind Command
description: Released v0.27.0 on February 2, 2026, featuring new event-driven scheduler for tool execution resulting in more responsive performance. Added queued tool confirmations, expandable large text pastes, new /rewind command for session history navigation, and Linux clipboard support for Wayland and X11.

title: GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark Research Preview
description: Announced GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark research preview on February 12, 2026, a smaller GPT-5.3 variant designed for real-time performance with 1000+ tokens/second on Cerebras Wafer Scale Engine 3. GPT-5.3-Codex also running 25% faster due to infrastructure and inference improvements as of February 5.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.3-Codex is now generally available for GitHub Copilot
GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark discussion on Hacker News

title: No February 2026 Updates
description: No official changelog updates found for February 2026. The most recent official release was v0.86.0 from August 2025. Aider continues to be known for writing 70-80% of its own code with 40,200+ features.

title: No February 2026 Updates
description: No specific changelog updates found for February 2026. The most recent documented updates from January 2026 included Agent Skills feature and WSL shell fixes.
